channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Foliage growing out of tree trunk, 2nd September
item.description:
Hi, I have a lovely lime tree outside my house but it has a lot of foliage growing out from trunk, Mums with children stop by it to cross the road when taking children to school but at the moment it is difficult to see what traffic is coming up Arle Road.. I was just asking if it is on the highways dept. to do list soon. Location is outside 185 Arle Road next to the Bus Stop. Many thanks for your help. Jean Hallas.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 154, Arle Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegally erected flag on lighting column., 2nd September
item.description:
Illegally erected (England) flag on lighting column at junction of Greyhound Gardens with Cheltenham Road, Gloucester. Should not be on the public highway, and could cause controversy in the current climate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greyhound Gardens, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 2nd September
item.description:
GIVE AND TAKE 28 DAY PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE REQUIRED PLEASE CUT BACK OVERGROWN HEDGE AN VEGETATION AND BRAMBLES BACK TO BOUNDARY APPROXIMATELY 30 metres x3 metres (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive amount of flytipping/litter, 2nd September
item.description:
Household waste, mattresses and multiple trolleys along the full length of the pedestrianised section here. As far as Springbank Park entrance
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blaisdon Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole aprox 60 cm wide. Very dangerous for cyclists (such as myself). Too deep to ride over, too close to the curb to go left and too dangerous to go right out into carriage way if vehicles behind., 2nd September
item.description:
A46 Painswick Road going South from juction with Ermine Street towards Stoud. About 75 metres before juction with Green Street. What3words: wallet.besotted.forget Has been there several months. (Photos taken would not upload - sorry)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Painswick Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree at the end of Cox's way in front of the lynch gate. No maintenance for over 30 years and extremely large and unweildly, 2nd September
item.description:
The tree at the end of Cox's Way Cul De Sac in front of the lynch gate has had no maintenance for over 30 years. It is excessively large and continues to expand.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cox's Way, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
